name: Sevo's War
description:
A quick dumb game (shooter) that you go around two levels i hope:{| and you just have to kill the bad guys ;)

Credits

Game Guru: for making this possible

Meh: cause u know i need to add meh in :)

Change log 

Added:

+New area to the map

+New Background 

+New weapon's 

+New guards

+New buildings

+More things can be exploded :)

Subtracted:

-Some Trees

Known Bugs and Glitches

-At the new part of the map the explosives don't explode other objects (boxes)

-Can jump over a particular fence 

-The sky goes white at some time

-Guards don't spawn where there meant to be spawned

-Can get stuck in between two trees
